text: Sean Henry is the Chief Executive Officer (CEO), President, and Alternate Governor of the National Hockey League's Nashville Predators. He has been with the Predators since September 7, 2010, as President and Alternate Governor, but assumed the role as CEO on December 1, 2015.Tennessean: Predators turn to Sean Henry to continue success Previously Henry had served since 1999 with the Tampa Bay Lightning where he held the position of chief operating officer.Nashville Business Journal: Predators hire Stars' Cogen, Lightning's Henry to become CEO and presidentUSA Today: Lightning exec Sean Henry accepts position with Predators Henry, who is a graduate of the State University of New York, has his name engraved on the Stanley Cup for the Lightning’s championship in 2004.Nashville Predators; Sean Henry,President/Chief Operating Officer Uncle of M3 Technology's COO Michael Caton. ==References== ==External links== *Nashville Pedators' profile Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Nashville Predators executives Category:Sports businesspeople Category:Stanley Cup champions Category:Stony Brook University alumni Category:Tampa Bay Lightning executives Category:American chief operating officers Category:American chief executives of professional sports organizations
title: Sean Henry (administrator)
